description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Guide That Orange Guy through 50 levels shooting and igniting everything in your path.  Spot a scary monster? No problem! Just shoot it in the face! Fearsome robot? Light it on fire!  Features: -50 levels spanning 5 worlds! -Over 30 enemies! -Comrades to rescue! -Boss fights! -3 stars to earn on each level! -Flamethrowers! -Zombie teddy bears! -Explosions! -And more!
